tiers.name: Foundation
tiers.description: Core stances and basic movement patterns. Focus on balance and comfort on wheels.
suggested_combos: Start with predator stance to build confidence
Work on toe pivot and heel pivot for direction changes

tiers.name: Transitions
tiers.description: Learn to change direction and stance while moving. Introduction to rotation.
suggested_combos: Tree into gazelle for a basic front-to-back transition
Lion into gazelle s for chained rotational flow
Practice ufo swivel as a standalone direction change

tiers.name: Presses & Pivots
tiers.description: Develop wheel control with presses and more dynamic pivoting.
suggested_combos: Gazelle into forward toe press for a flowing sequence
Tree into fast slide for practical speed control
Combine heel press with parallel slide

tiers.name: Spins & Rolls
tiers.description: Full rotations and sustained rolling techniques. Requires strong foundation.
suggested_combos: Tree into forward 180 for a basic spin combo
Gazelle into fakie 360 for advanced flow
Stunami into toe roll for dynamic chaining

tiers.name: Advanced Slides
tiers.description: Technical slide variations requiring precise foot positioning and edge control.
suggested_combos: Lion into forward soul slide for an aggressive line
Gazelle into fakie acid slide for style points
Chain multiple slides: mizu slide into star slide

tiers.name: Expert
tiers.description: The pinnacle of wizard skating. 540 spins and complex multi-trick combos.
suggested_combos: Tree into forward 540 for maximum rotation
Gazelle into fakie 540 into toe roll for a 3-trick expert combo
Build 4-5 trick combos mixing all categories

progression_tips: Master each tier before moving to the next
Always warm up with foundation moves
Practice both front and back directions for every move
For moves with open/closed stances, learn both variations
Rotating moves (gazelle, lion, 180, 540, stunami, ufo swivel) change your facing direction â€” plan your combo accordingly
ONLY_FIRST moves (predator, predator one, parallel) can only start a combo, never appear mid-combo
USE_FAKIE moves display as 'fakie' when going back and 'forward' when going front
